## Source: ossf-package-analysis (59673c0fc4701541ff9cf2002ba260a6cb6429a2b8ed7bd4398362bab5b421b1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'feedback-html2canvas' @ 10.20.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
